meanings: 레스토랑 찾기 I'd be happy if I could change it from the 5th to the 7th.
레스토랑 찾기 I'd be pleased if you could change it from the 5th to the 7th.

phrases.phrase: 조금 더 싸게 해 주시면 사겠습니다.
meanings: 매장에서 If you mark it down a bit, I'll buy it.

phrases.phrase: 기회만 주시면 저의 능력을 보여 드리겠습니다!
meanings: 구직활동 Just give me the chance and I'll show you what I can do!

vlive.korean: 주시면... If you give... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Replay] GOT7 Mark&Yu-Gyeom's-GOT7 마크&유겸X<같이먹어요>
진 형이 뭐 하나 정해 주시면 안 될까요? Jin, won't you pick one for us? 듣기 View video BTS : 꿀FM <지진정의 R.A.D.I.O 라디오> #중대발표
vlive.english: Jin, won't you pick one for us?

vlive.korean: 선입금 해 주시면 - 선입금이요? I'll show you if you pay me first. - Pay you first? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.24 드립 : 세븐틴 갓 탤런트 #2 (Ad-lib : Seventeen's got Talent #2)
vlive.english: I'll show you if you pay me first. - Pay you first?

vlive.korean: 저희도 이만 들어가보겠습니다 - 지진정태라고 한번 넣어주시면 안 돼요? We'll get going now. - Could you put me in as Ji-Jin-Jung-Tae? 듣기 View video BTS : 꿀FM <지진정의 R.A.D.I.O 라디오> #중대발표
vlive.english: We'll get going now. - Could you put me in as Ji-Jin-Jung-Tae?

vlive.korean: 다음 질문을 주시면 좋을 것... Please give me the next que.. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Jeong Eun Ji X CouchTalk - 정은지 X 카우치토크
vlive.english: Please give me the next que..

examples.korean: Prompt payment of the invoice would be appreciated. 발음듣기 청구 대금을 즉각 지불해 주시면 고맙겠습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Prompt payment of the invoice would be appreciated. 발음

examples.korean: I’d like a room with a view. 발음듣기 전망이 좋은 방을 주시면 좋겠군요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’d like a room with a view. 발음

examples.korean: I wish you’d be quiet for a minute. 발음듣기 잠시 좀 조용히 해 주시면 좋겠어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I wish you’d be quiet for a minute. 발음

examples.korean: I would appreciate it if you paid in cash. 발음듣기 현금으로 지불해 주시면 고맙겠습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I would appreciate it if you paid in cash. 발음

examples.korean: I’d be grateful if you would keep it a secret. 발음듣기 그것을 비밀로 해 주시면 고맙겠어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’d be grateful if you would keep it a secret. 발음
